title: Is mineral water harmful to health? Important disclosure GeoTv News | Geo Tv News
text: Water is the basic need of every living being, and clean and clear water is the guarantee of good health, which is why even in ancient times, water was boiled and used in homes. Over time, mineral water became used to drink clean water instead of boiled water, which health experts now consider harmful to health due to some reasons. However, search According to the report Now, medical experts have warned mineral water users, saying that this water available in plastic bottles is harmful to human health in every way. According to a study, some water companies use poor quality plastic bottles. The harmful components of these plastics are added to the water. but According to a research, the use of mineral water provides many benefits to the human body. It should be noted that, according to the Food and Drug Administration, potassium, sodium, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, and sulfur are added to mineral water. Apart from maintaining strong bones in the human body, these minerals also maintain proper blood pressure. According to research, the use of mineral water provides many benefits to the human body. While mineral water is beneficial, its poor packaging is very harmful to human health.
